hero_description: Shape history through natural language. Control nations, make decisions, and watch the AI simulate the consequences of your choices.
hero_subtitle: An AI-powered alternate history simulation game where every action matters.
feature_natural_language_desc: Describe your actions in free-form text. The AI understands context and generates plausible consequences.
feature_historical_scenarios_desc: Choose from pre-configured historical periods like WWI, Cold War, and Ancient Rome.
feature_persistent_world_desc: Every decision shapes the world. Watch relationships evolve and resources change based on your choices.
error_loading_games: Failed to load your games. Please try again later.
seed_database: Seed the database to get started.
choose_nation_desc: Choose a nation to play in "{scenarioName}".
no_nations_configured: This scenario has no nations configured yet.
delete_scenario_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{scenarioName}"? This action cannot be undone.
action_placeholder: Describe your action (e.g., 'Invest in military infrastructure', 'Propose a trade alliance with France')...
unexpected_error_submit: An unexpected error occurred while submitting your turn. Please try again.
ollama_error_desc: ChronoFlux needs a local Ollama instance to process AI turns
ollama_docs_desc: Check the official Ollama documentation for detailed setup instructions and troubleshooting.
turn_complete_desc: Review the consequences of your actions for Turn {turnNumber}
no_significant_events: No significant events occurred this turn.
check_world_map: Check the World Map for updated relationships.
json_edit_hint: Edit the JSON directly to configure nations and relationships.
settings_description: Configure your local Ollama instance connection details and display preferences.
error_cors_issue: Could not connect. Check URL and ensure OLLAMA_ORIGINS="*" is set.
error_page_description: The timeline seems to have disrupted. The page you are looking for might have been moved, deleted, or never existed in this timeline.
advisor_description: Consult with your advisor on matters of state.
advisor_initial_greeting: Greetings, my liege. How may I serve the realm today?
advisor_error_message: My apologies, my liege. I am unable to provide counsel at this moment.
openrouter_info: OpenRouter provides access to various AI models via cloud API.
error_openrouter_invalid_key: Invalid API key. Please check your OpenRouter API key.
error_openrouter_rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
error_openrouter_no_credits: Insufficient credits. Please add credits to your OpenRouter account.
settings_description_provider: Configure your AI provider settings and display preferences.
ai_error_desc: ChronoFlux needs an AI provider to process game turns
openrouter_docs_desc: Check your API key and account status on OpenRouter.
delete_game_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this game? This action cannot be undone.
step_enable_cors_remote_desc: Allow connections from this specific origin
step_enable_cors_systemd_desc: Configure environment variables for the systemd service
